SELECT c.UserName as userName, CASE WHEN c.Alias IS NULL OR c.Alias = '' THEN c.UserName ELSE c.Alias END AS alias, c.Remark as remark, c.NickName as nickName, c.LabelIDList as labelIdList, c.Reserved6 as describe, chiu.smallHeadImgUrl as headImgUrl FROM Contact c LEFT JOIN ContactHeadImgUrl chiu ON c.UserName=chiu.usrName WHERE Type % 2 = 1 AND VerifyFlag = 0 AND UserName NOT IN ( 'floatbottle', 'fmessage', 'medianote','filehelper' ) AND UserName NOT LIKE '%@chatroom'
AND Remark LIKE '%' || #{contactDTO.remark} || '%'
AND NickName LIKE '%' || #{contactDTO.nickName} || '%'
AND (',' || LabelIDList || ',') LIKE '%' || #{contactDTO.labels} || '%'
AND Reserved6 LIKE '%' || #{contactDTO.describe} || '%'
ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(RemarkPYInitial, ''), PYInitial)

SELECT c.UserName as userName, CASE WHEN c.Remark IS NULL OR c.Remark = '' THEN c.NickName ELSE c.Remark END AS nickName FROM Contact c WHERE Type % 2 = 1 AND VerifyFlag = 0 AND UserName NOT IN ( 'floatbottle', 'fmessage', 'medianote','filehelper' ) AND UserName NOT LIKE '%@chatroom' ORDER BY COALESCE(NULLIF(RemarkPYInitial, ''), PYInitial)

SELECT CASE WHEN c.Alias IS NULL OR c.Alias = '' THEN c.UserName ELSE c.Alias END AS alias FROM Contact c WHERE Type % 2 = 1 AND VerifyFlag = 0 UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN c.Alias IS NULL OR c.Alias = '' THEN c.UserName ELSE c.Alias END AS alias FROM Contact c WHERE UserName LIKE 'gh_%' AND Alias <> ''
SELECT count(*) FROM Contact c WHERE Type % 2 = 1 AND VerifyFlag = 0 AND UserName NOT IN ( 'floatbottle', 'fmessage', 'medianote','filehelper' ) AND UserName NOT LIKE '%@chatroom';
